source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 903,855 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 351,576.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

spells.description:
Equip: When you enter combat, gain 1 Dormant Gemstone per socketed gem.

Whenever you heal an ally, bestow upon them 1 Empowered Gemstone to increase the potency of one of their socketed gems by 141 for 20 sec. When their gemstone becomes dormant, it is returned to you.

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 903,855 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 351,576.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Frenzied Stormrider's Epaulets
Frenzied Stormrider's Epaulets

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 903,855 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 351,576.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

spell.description: Use: Activate your personal space amplifier to knockback an enemy within melee range of you. (10 Min Cooldown)

spells.description:
Use: Inject a medicinal frostfire formula into your veins, instantly healing you for up to 4.7 million from a jolt of frost. To prevent sudden hypothermia, you will then burn for 30% of the amount healed.

Shares a cooldown with healing potions. (5 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Safety fuses built into this device reduce the chance of its slotted tinker malfunctioning by up to 15%. Does not stack with similar specialization bonuses.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Blood Knight's Dedication Bracers

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 903,855 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 351,576.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

spells.description:
Equip: Your healing spells and abilities have a chance to summon Mister Pick-Me-Up for 6 sec, firing a healing beam every 2 sec that jumps between 5 injured allies to restore 113,169 health each.

Overhealing from this effect irradiates allies to deal Nature damage to nearby enemies over 1.5 sec, increased by additional overhealing.

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,934 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 209 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

spell.description: Use: Reduces your falling speed for 2 min. (3 Min Cooldown)

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Fallen Defender of Argus

spells.description: Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 50%.
